price: Allah tarafından önceden verilmiş bir hüküm olmasaydı, aldığınız fidyeden ötürü size mutlaka büyük bir azap dokunurdu.
arabic: لَّوۡلَا كِتَٰبٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ سَبَقَ لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِيمَآ أَخَذۡتُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lawlā kitābun mina al-lahi sabaqa lamassakum fīmā akhadhtum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
